sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you <radical>mix</radical> a bunch of <radical>building</radical>s together, you have yourself a <kanji>suburb</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Isn't that all a suburb is? Just a mix of a variety of buildings in one area?
readingMnemonic: "<kanji>Suburb</kanji>s are what we need!" says Emperor <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>.
readingInfo: "That suburb life will encourage more people to study kanji," Emperor <ja>こういち</ja> continues.
